overview: It's a  bangla short film. This is a story of human life where you can find the tragedy of helpless man. This short film Tader Jibon is a hurt touching video. Tader Jibon is not only a story, but also a true theme which we can find our daily life. Hope by seeing this video we will stay besides the helpless man. I think this short film Tader Jibon will like by everyone.
title: Tader Jibon
